Stem: Yellowish-green to bluish-green, flattened, circular to rhombus shaped, narrowing at the end, usually smooth and hairless with up to 12 spines 1-5 cm long at nodes.
Leaves: Scale like on new growth and short lived.
Flowers: Showy bright yellow, orange, pink, or red. 3-4 cm across.
FruitSeeds: Oval to barrel-shaped 4-9 cm long, spineless and smooth. Dark red or purplish colour. Containing brown to grey seeds.
Habitat: Grasslands, disurbed areas, urban bushland, arid areas.
